borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions: <p><span style="font-size:11pt">The proposed development, by reason of scale and siting&nbsp;within a rear garden setting, would be at odds with the surrounding pattern of development and would result in harm to neighbouring occupiers through the overshadowing of the rear garden at no.192 and the additional generation of noise, waste, smoke, fumes and comings and goings.&nbsp;The development would therefore constitute&nbsp;unneighbourly&nbsp;development and is contrary to: </span></p><p><span style="font-size:11pt">National Planning Policy Framework (DLUHC, 2023); </span></p><p><span style="font-size:11pt">Policies D1 and D4 of the London Plan (March 2021);&nbsp; </span></p><p><span style="font-size:11pt">Policy CP3 of the LDF Core Strategy (July 2010);&nbsp; </span></p><p><span style="font-size:11pt">Policies BP8 and BP11 of the LDF Borough Wide Development Plan Document (March 2011);&nbsp; </span></p><p><span style="font-size:11pt">Policies SP2, DMD1 and DMD6 of The London Borough of Barking and Dagenhamâ€™s Draft Local Plan: (Regulation 19 Submission Version, December 2021); </span></p><p><span style="font-size:11pt">Residential Extensions and Alterations Supplementary Planning Document (February 2012)</span></p>

<p style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:11pt">The principle of introducing a self-contained outbuilding of&nbsp;primary residential use within the garden setting of no.192 is not supported. The proposal therefore represents an&nbsp;inappropriate and uncharacteristic residential form in a rear garden setting&nbsp;which results in harm to the occupiers of the main dwelling at no.192. As such, the proposal is contrary to:&nbsp; </span></p><p style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:11pt">National Planning Policy Framework (DLUHC, 2023); </span></p><p style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:11pt">Policies D1 and D4 of the London Plan (March 2021);&nbsp;</span></p><p style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:11pt">Policy CP3 of the&nbsp;Local Development Framework Core Strategy (July 2010);</span></p><p style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:11pt">Policies BP8 and BP11 of the LDF Borough Wide Development Plan Document (March 2011);</span></p><p style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:11pt">Policies SP2,&nbsp; SP4, DMD1 and DMD6 of the Draft Local Plan (Regulation 19 Consultation Version, October 2020); </span></p><p style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:11pt">Residential Extensions and Alterations Supplementary Planning Document (February 2012)</span></p><br data-cke-eol="1">
description: Demolition of existing outbuilding and construction of a rear outbuilding for use as a residential annexe
